artist: Painter: After Francesco Gessi; Draftsman: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Guilio Tomba
description: Saint Bonaventure standing at right and a group of people at left with a dead child between them being brought back to life; an arched composition
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [F.Gessi dip   F Rosaspina dis.   G. Tomba inc./ S. BONAVENTURA CHE DA VITA AD UN BAMBINO NATO MORTO]; in pencil on sheet: [1-464]
title: S. Bonaventura che da vita ad un Bambino Nato Morto
